Reviews.Title: Samsung SEA-C101 100ft BNC and Power Cable
Reviews.Author: jimmy56
Reviews.Content: I needed these 100 footers because the cameras I purchased only had 60 footers... after making my connections and plugging them in to the recorder, they worked great... They came in white...

Reviews.Title: It'd be great if I got what I asked for
Reviews.Author: DeliGuy
Reviews.Content: Plain and simple, this is not an Amazon product, they have someone else send it.  The shopper have me the correct cable, HOWEVER failed to provide the proper extension adapter.  The metal ring didn't even fit for the wire provided. I couldn't wait for another shipment(s), so I stripped the wire and jimmy rigged it.  I didn't report it until now.  Guess ill make my official report about it after I hit publish review!

Reviews.Title: Received in good time, everything looks good
Reviews.Author: Howard Moss
Reviews.Content: Received everything great, looks to be what I needed, but so far weather has been too bad to get installed. I'm just hopeful it works OK with my new security system, going to install ASAP

ProductInfo.Features:
New
Samsung Security Products SEA-C101
Samsung Security Products SEA-C101 Cable for SEB1020RN
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung SEA-C101 100ft BNC and Power Cable
